source.b6331b68:
## Correlation
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
#get correlations of each features in dataset
corrmat = df1.corr()
top_corr_features = corrmat.index
plt.figure(figsize=(20,20))
#plot heat map
g=sns.heatmap(df1[top_corr_features].corr(),annot=True,cmap="RdYlGn")
source.11ed5195:
# list of numerical variables
numerical_features = [feature for feature in df1.columns if df1[feature].dtypes != 'O']

print('Number of numerical variables: ', len(numerical_features))

# visualise the numerical variables
df1[numerical_features].head()
source.a41885c0:
# list of variables that contain year information
daily_feature = [feature for feature in numerical_features if 'daily'  in feature]

daily_feature
source.25ae61cf:
## Here we will compare the difference between All the daily feature with pfizer3

for feature in daily_feature:
    if feature!='daily_partial':
        data=df1.copy()
        ## We will capture the difference between daily variable and  type of vaccin.
        data[feature]=data['daily_partial']-data[feature]

        plt.scatter(data[feature],data['pfizer3'])
        plt.xlabel(feature)
        plt.ylabel('pfizer3')
        plt.show()

## Here we will compare the difference between All the daily feature with pfizer3
